dcterms:description: A dataset containing torso CT scans of 150 patients, from which slices between the neck and liver are extracted, forming a chest CT dataset of 30,000 slices, each with 512 Ã— 512 pixels. The images are pre-processed to convert Hounsfield Units to attenuation coefficients and remove the patient table.

dcterms:description: A dataset of high-quality CT images used for training the Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPM).
